desc.en: This module implements requirements that is to allow an OXID eShop to comply with the EU regulations as specified by the EU VAT directive 1042/2013 regarding VAT for telecommunications, broadcasting and electronic services.
desc.de: Dieses Modul implementiert die Anforderungen der EU MwSt-Direktive 1042/2013 bezüglich Telekommunikation, Übertragungsdienste und elektronische Services in OXID eShop
